detail_desc: Jacket in soft pile with a hood, zip down the front and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Short, three-strand metal necklace. Adjustable length, 31-39 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with flounces. Elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Dress in a patterned jacquard weave containing glittery threads. Short cap sleeves, buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Body in lace and mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups lined with mesh in a contrasting colour and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined cups with press-studs.
Hooded jacket in a fine, lightly brushed knit with a zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbed trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless body in cotton jersey with metal studs at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in textured premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides of the hem.
Dress in airy chiffon with butterfly sleeves, an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Thin metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers in fast-drying functional fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbing at the hems.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Round-necked jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Set with a hair doughnut and three hair pins. Two hair pins with glittery antlers and one with a pompom on the top.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust, elastication at the back of the waist and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Biker jacket in imitation patent leather with a faux shearling lining. Notch lapels, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets.
Calf-length, pleated dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the top and a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Laser-cut edges at the hems.
Turtleneck top in softly draping, narrow-ribbed jersey with a sheen. Decorative metal buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sweatshirt in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués, twisted side seams and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, narrow sides and high cut at the back.
Short skirt in glossy twill with concealed elastication at the waist and a seam at the hem with a wide, embroidered flounce.
Sandals in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the ankle. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Pull-on trousers in an airy viscose weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Relaxed fit with side pockets and tapered legs.

Fitted skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high, pleated paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Metal hair clip with a large bow decorated in plastic beads and shimmering rhinestones.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with two compartments on each side and one compartment at the top. Height 7 cm. Width 10 cm.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, button fly, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Metal earrings in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in jersey with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Balaclava in soft, patterned thermal fleece.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with a zip at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap. Two outer compartments with a hook and loop fastening and an open inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Cropped vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Gently fitted jacket in a soft linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a draped effect at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Set with a cotton vest top and shorts. Vest top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg.
Short metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 46-54 cm.
Short skirt in stretch twill with a high waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Unlined.
Jersey T-shirt with a wide neck and chest pocket.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with gathered elastication at the front for a gently draped effect.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a square, elasticated neckline front and back. Smocked seam under the bust, and a smocked seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Hooded top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the top, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft, lightly brushed inside.

Oversized puffer jacket in a padded weave with a high collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Diagonal side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Shirt in a soft cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, fake chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Cotton jersey tops with a narrow shoulder straps, a racer back and elasticated hem.

Short dress in cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length balloon sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Round, ribbed neckline and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Wide, straight-style jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders, long, close-fitting sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a drawstring V-neck, short sleeves with a seam and flounced trim, and an asymmetric seam at the hem with a flounce.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
